titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Multidisciplinary Team Discussion Date (Cancer) - Description

div.p: A Multidisciplinary Team Discussion Date (Cancer) is an ACTIVITY DATE TIME.
A Multidisciplinary Team Discussion Date (Cancer) is the date on which the PATIENT's Cancer Care Plan was discussed at a Multidisciplinary Team Meeting and a treatment planning decision was made.
This may include more than one relevant option for treatment and will normally be before the date of the First Definitive Treatment.

Where the PATIENT receives their first treatment as an emergency it may be after the first treatment date. The treatment planning decision may differ from the treatment which is subsequently agreed with the PATIENT.
